The, particular attention tyf all Departments concerned is drawn -to the following Resolution of the above Committee (CP,8008)."That'all windows, balconies, doorways and areas in Government offices1 o.n either side of Whitehall between Downing Street and Great George Street be reserved for the disposal ef His Majesty1s Government on November 11th, 1920, plans being drawn up for the purpose.", (Signed) M.P,AvHaEESY.Secretary, Cabinet.2 Whitehall Gardens,.. 3.;-J*1. 28th October, 1920.
